\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
Node to perform the check\+\_\+consistency action of the P\+D\+DL domain.

\end{DoxyAuthor}

October 2022
\end{DoxyDate}
description\+: This node implements the R\+O\+S\+Plan Check\+Consistency\+Action\+Interface\+: the corresponding behaviour for the check\+\_\+consistency action in the P\+D\+Dl file
